title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + California Watch’s seismic safety story: Valuable lessons for reporting any story, anywhere
description: A report on how California law requires the state architect’s office to enforce the Field Act, seismic regulations enacted nearly 80 years ago, and how state regulators routinely failed to enforce it, allowing children and teachers to occupy buildings with structural flaws and potential safety hazards.
